sentences.sContent: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.sContent_eng: But while our screens are brittle, theirs is flexible––at what they say is one tenth the price.
sentences.sCn: 但我们的屏幕都很脆弱，他们的却很柔软，而且价钱是我们的十分之一。

synos.tran: 易碎的，[冶]脆弱的；易生气的

phrases.pCn: 脆性破坏；脆性疲劳；脆性失败

remMethod.val: 幼小的 (little) 的心灵是脆弱的 (brittle)

words.tran: [材] 脆性，[材] 脆度；脆弱性

trans.tranCn: 易碎的，脆弱的；易生气的
